attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we are only a small island and we are letting far to many people in the country our jails are overcrowded hospicals stretched to limits councils are struggling enough is enough there will be no countryside because there is a shortage off houses

rejection.details:
Your title should be a call for action, not a statement / name.

Also, other similar petitions already exist, for example: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/britishbritain/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
